A small chest for storing valuables.

An indecipherable message is scrawled on the tombside in fresh blood. You wonder what undead lord calls this sarcophagus his home.

This hunched creature is fashioned from dark stone. From the corner of your eye it almost seems to move, but when you turn to face it, all is still.
